texts.value: Catalyzes the condensation of acetyl-CoA with acetoacetyl-CoA to form HMG-CoA, which is converted by HMG-CoA reductase (HMGCR) into mevalonate, a precursor for cholesterol synthesis

Belongs to the thiolase-like superfamily. HMG-CoA synthase family
